generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, flanked by sidewalks and trees.
- sidewalk: Sidewalks are visible on both sides of the road, bordered by curbs and trees, with some pedestrians and a cyclist on them.
- building: A white building with a dark roof is visible on the left side of the road, and other buildings are partially visible on the right.
- vegetation: Numerous trees line both sides of the road, and some hedges are visible near the buildings.
- terrain: Grass and soil are visible along the edges of the sidewalk and in small patches between trees.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy, appearing overcast.
- person: Pedestrians are visible on the left sidewalk, including a person pushing a stroller and another walking nearby.
- rider: A person riding a bicycle is visible on the right sidewalk.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a silver sedan in the middle of the road and a black car parked on the left.
- fence: A low fence or hedge is visible along the sidewalk on the left side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the sidewalk, including those supporting streetlights and possibly traffic signs.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- motorcycle: No motorcycles are visible in the image.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the right sidewalk, being ridden by a person.
- truck: No trucks are visible in the image.
- bus: No buses are visible in the image.
- train: No trains are visible in the image.
